TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Langas, title = Langas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Langas} }

S.FORM: alang Langas ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Hamicho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 136 buwan, 342 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 89% kyan ku 304 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 11% kyan ku 38 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 68%, Bunun 18%, Paywan 1%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Langas hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Langas hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Langas hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Langas hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na Langas hya' ga Morocan. tay 'llaw na Langas hya' ga Olaw. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Langas ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Langas ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Langas ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Hamicho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 136 bowan, 342 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 89% kyan ko 304 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 11% kyan ko 38 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 68%, Bonon 18%, Paywan 1%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Langas hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Langas hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Langas hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Langas hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na Langas hya' ga Morocan. tay 'llaw na Langas hya' ga Olaw. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Langas ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Langas ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
